channel.title: SoftLayer_Network_Logging_Syslog on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Logging_Syslog
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Logging_Syslog Datatype Description The Syslog class holds a single line from the Networking Firewall “Syslog” record, for firewall detected and blocked attempts on a server. Local createDate Timestamp for when the connection was blocked by the firewall Type: dateTime destinationIpAddress The Destination IP Address of the blocked connection (your end) Type: string destinationPort The Destination Port of the blocked connection (your end) Type: integer
